original_title: White Light/Black Rain: The Destruction of Hiroshima and Nagasaki
overview: Steven Okazaki presents a deeply moving look at the painful legacy of the first -- and hopefully last -- uses of nuclear weapons in war. Featuring interviews with fourteen atomic bomb survivors - many who have never spoken publicly before - and four Americans intimately involved in the bombings, White Light/Black Rain provides a detailed exploration of the bombings and their aftermath.
title: White Light/Black Rain: The Destruction of Hiroshima and Nagasaki
